name: GTA V (Grand Theft Auto V)
about_game: When a young street hustler, a retired bank robber and a terrifying psychopath find themselves entangled with some of the most frightening elements of the criminal underworld, they must pull off a series of dangerous heists to survive in a ruthless city.

requirements.minimum: OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 | RAM: 8GB | GPU: NVIDIA 9800 GT | Storage: 110 GB
requirements.recommended: OS: Windows 11 | CPU: Intel Core i5 3470 | RAM: 16GB | GPU: NVIDIA GTX 660

name: Far Cry 6
about_game: Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. As the dictator of Yara, Ant√≥n Castillo is intent on restoring his nation back to its former glory by any means, with his son, Diego, following in his bloody footsteps. Their oppressive rule has ignited a revolution.

requirements.minimum: OS: Windows 10 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 | RAM: 8GB | GPU: AMD RX 460 | Storage: 60 GB
requirements.recommended: OS: Windows 11 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X | RAM: 16GB | GPU: NVIDIA GTX 1080
